title: Deserted Island Survival Notes - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Fantasy   Josei   Romance   Smut   Supernatural
tags: Clever Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Fantasy Creatures   Female Protagonist   First-time Interc**rse   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Lost Civilizations   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Pregnancy   Slow Romance   Survival   Transported to Another World

description: Ye Zheng takes a cruise with some friends only to meet with a terrible accident. Lost on an unfamiliar island with no way home, she attempts to survive with only the clothes on her back and her beloved bow. However, she’s lost but she’s definitely not alone…>
